{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = Dongle600.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = BT Dual-Band Wi-Fi Dongle 600 |caption2 = BT Dual band 2x2 Wireless USB Dongle for Windows |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = BT_Dual-Band_Wi-Fi_Dongle_N_600 |wikipedia = |brand = BT |model = Dual-Band Wi-Fi Dongle |submodelappend = |submodel = N 600 |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = 075715 |page_start_date = July 5, 2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/BT_Dual-Band_Wi-Fi_Dongle_N_600 |sernum = |wlclass = AN600 |series = |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = dongle |vendor_id = 0a5c |device_id = bd17 |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = |chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43236; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = SGE |manuf_model = WNA699U5N3 |manuf_rev = .GW82-5.8G |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = abgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = |price = 53.50 |upc = |ean = 5016351515167 |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B00D84GVF8 |asin_country = GB |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This is a [[Broadcom]] BCM43xx based adapter ([http://listing.driveragent.com/c/vusb/Broadcom%20Corp/0a5c 0a5c]) 
43a0	BT Wi-Fi Dongle
43a1	BT Dual-Band Wi-Fi Dongle
43a2	BT 802.11ac Wireless USB Adapter
Possible USB IDs follow... *USB\VID_0A5C&PID_BD13 (default BCM4323 ID) *USB\VID_0A5C&PID_BD16 (default BCM4319 ID) *USB\VID_0A5C&PID_BD17 (BCM43236 802.11abgn 2T2R) :appears to be used by the [[BT Dual-Band Wi-Fi Dongle N 600]] *USB\VID_0A5C&PID_BD1D (BCM43526 802.11abgn/ac 2T2R) [https://wireless.wiki.kernel.org/en/users/Drivers/brcm80211 usb] :appears to be used by the [[BT Dual-Band Wi-Fi Dongle AC 900]] *USB\VID_0A5C&PID_BD1E (default BCM43143 ID) [https://wireless.wiki.kernel.org/en/users/Drivers/brcm80211 usb] *USB\VID_0A5C&PID_BD1F (default BCM43242 ID) [https://wireless.wiki.kernel.org/en/users/Drivers/brcm80211 usb] *USB\VID_0A5C&PID_43A0 (BCM43235 2.4GHz band only, 802.11bgn) :appears to be used by the [[BT Wi-Fi Dongle N 300]] *USB\VID_0A5C&PID_43A1 (unknown, dual band, 802.11abgn) *USB\VID_0A5C&PID_43A2 (unknown, dual band, 802.11abgn/ac) For some unknown reason, with driver will also install WinPcap along with it. It is likely similar to the [[AirTies Air 2410]]. ==Links of Interest== [http://bt.custhelp.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/45437/ Support page] ([http://bt.custhelp.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/44423/ alternate])
[http://bt.custhelp.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/45467/ Drivers] ([http://bt.custhelp.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/44174/ alternate])
[http://catalog.update.microsoft.com/v7/site/ScopedViewRedirect.aspx?updateid=b78e6df7-da7c-4152-957a-22643f3d4123 WinXP drivers available via '''Windows Update''' (.cab file)]
[http://www.shop.bt.com/products/bt-dual-band-wi-fi-dongle-600-8W45.html On '''shop.bt.com''']
[http://www.shop.bt.com/content/uni2/documentation/8w45/dual-band_wi-fi_dongle_600_data_sheet_v1.1.pdf Datasheet] *[http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=2232700 ''No WIFI detected using BT dual band dongle'' on '''Ubuntu Forums'''] :USB ID seems to be the default 43236 ID (0a5c:bd17), :but it's a rev. 2 chip - not a 43236b ==Notes== === Additional specifications, per '''BT''''s datasheet === *Weight: [[Weight::12.5 g]] *Dimension:: [[Dimensions::80 mm x 28 mm x 9 mm]] *Giftbox barcode: 5016351515167 *Overpack (40x Giftbox) barcode: 05016351822265 [[Category:English Documentation]]
